comment.author: 22968943@N05
comment._content: Seems this plane is/was still flying years later.  Try a web search on the tail number...

comment.author: 78792726@N00
comment._content: This aircraft is a 1936 Waco YKS-6 Custom Cabin. As perfgeek remarks, it's still flying as of 2008 thanks to a beautiful restoration by John Reed of Schellville, California The engine is a 245-horsepower Jacobs R-755.

comment.author: 23269353@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Aircraft of the Civil Air Patrol, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
